step_data.thought: I have already accessed the order details page and noted the shipping address for order #000000002 in the previous action. The shipping address is displayed as follows: 'Veronica Costello, 6146 Honey Bluff Parkway, Calder, Michigan, 49628-7978, United States, T: (555) 229-3326'. Since I have retrieved the necessary information, I can now inform the user about the shipping address.
step_data.action: stop('The shipping address for order #000000002 is: Veronica Costello, 6146 Honey Bluff Parkway, Calder, Michigan, 49628-7978, United States, T: (555) 229-3326.')
